title: Zain's blog
subtitle: notes and thoughts as I break things
intro: I'm Zain, currently a student @ VJTI Mumbai. I've been exploring computers and their low level architectures for sometime now, and I'm always looking for new things to learn! Don't hesitate to reach out to me if you want to collaborate on something, or just want to chat. I'm always up for a good conversation!
current_activities: Learning about computer architecture by building a RISC-V CPU
Reading papers on ML accelerators and their architectures
Playing hide and seek with my cat
Looking for collaborations on impactful research in computer architecture and ML (please reach out if you're interested!)
